Articles.Content:
Does anybody know a place to get the most recent biome maps...with legends showing which color is which biome? I'm doing science landings on Duna and a legend would be extremely useful.

Vic
I can't speak for accuracy, but http://ksp.deringenieur.net/ seems to be a new/temporary home of kerbalmaps.com

On ‎2‎/‎15‎/‎2018 at 4:54 PM, 5thHorseman said:

I can't speak for accuracy, but http://ksp.deringenieur.net/ seems to be a new/temporary home of kerbalmaps.com

Unless I'm not finding the right tool, the maps don't name the biomes. Still, the maps there do have some usefulness.
Another option is to use the ScanSat mod to make your own maps.
I thought about that James. For now I'm using the map on the Wiki and I am adding a legend as I land and figure out the colors.

I've made an updated Duna Biome Map myself that includes coloured labels for the biomes. I'd add it to the ksp wiki but theres currently an issue with uploading and updating images. Needs to be fixed.
Yeah, we need that fixed. But, I'm doing a ScanSat of Duna and will post a link to the biome map with color labels here when it is complete. I've got FTP from my ISP so I'll put it there.
